name: The Abandoned Hospital
description:
The Abandoned Hospital is a horror game made on scratch by DaTrueMeme (scratch username) or AlexDM (YouTube username).

If you find any bugs, please tell me!

Also tell me if you want a part 2!

INSTALATION INTRUCTIONS :

Download the .zip file. Unzip file then double-click the Abandoned Hospital.exe file. It will say "windows protected your PC", its ok, it says that because it has an unknown publisher. Click "more info", then click "run anyway".
